ref.mixed-citation: S.I. Korolev, Voprosy etnopsikhologii v rabotakh zarubezhnykh avtorov [Questions of Ethno- psychology in the Works of Foreign Authors], 1970.

M.A. Vitkin, "Pervichnaia ekonomicheskaia formatsiia v trudakh K. Marksa" ["The primary economic order in the works of Marx"], Voprosy filosofii, no. 5 (1967)

"Problema perekhoda ot pervichnoi lormatsii ko vtorichnoi" ["The problem of the transition from the primary to the secondary social order"], in Pro blemy istorii dokapitalisticheskikh obshchestv, Book 1 (Moscow, 1968)

"Nekotorye osobennosti razvitiia dokapitalisticheskikh formatsii" ["Some peculiarities of the development of pre¬ capitalist social orders"], in Filosofskie problemy istoricheskoi nauki (Moscow, 1969).

A.L. Mongait and A.I. Pershits, "Nekotorye vopros> pervobytnoi istorii v sovetskoi literature poslevoennykh let" ["Some questions of primeval history in the postwar Soviet literature"], Voprosy istorii, no. 1 (1955).
M.O. Kosven, Matriarkhat: istoriia problemy [The Matriarchate: the history of the problem] (Moscow-Leningrad, 1948)
Ocherki istorii pervobytnoi kul'tury [Outline of the history of primeval culture] (Moscow, 1957).
M. Mamar4ashvili, "Analiz soznaniia v rabotakh Marksa" ["The analysis of consciousness in the works of Marx"], Voprosy filosofii, no. 6 (1968).
Sula Benet, ed. and trans., The Village of Viriatino (Garden City, N.Y.: Doubleday, 1970).

Vsesoiuznyi Simpozium, "Vsesoiuznyi simpozium po sotsiologicheskim problemam sela, Krasnodar, 1968, Doklady [All-Union symposium on sociological problems of the countryside, Krasnodar, 1968, papers] (Novosibirsk, 1968).
A. Amalryk, Prosushchestvuet Ii SSSR do 1984 go da? [Will the USSR survive until 1984?] (Amsterdam, 1970), p. 33.
Ketskii sbornik [Collected papers on the Kets] (Moscow, 1965).
Poiski vymyshlennogo tsarstva (Legenda o "gosudarstve presvitera Ioanna") [Searches in an imaginary kingdom (The legend of Prester John's state)] (Moscow, 1970).
